headerEntries: The knight is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following wizard spells, which it can cast without somatic or material components.

trait.name: Bonded Weapon
entries: The knight's bonded weapon is its javelin. The eldritch knight cannot be disarmed if it is wielding its javelin. As a bonus action, the knight can magically teleport its javelin into its hand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks with its javelin.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Arcane Shot (1/Turn)
entries: When the archer hits a creature with a ranged weapon attack, it can apply one of the following effects to the target in addition to the damage of the attack:

items.name: Grasping Arrow
entries: The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, its speed is reduced by 10 feet, and it is overwhelmed by brambles, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage the first time on each turn it moves 1 foot or more without teleporting. The target or any creature that can reach it can use its action to remove the brambles. Otherwise, they last for 1 minute.

items.name: Shadow Arrow
entries: The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the archer's next turn.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The archer has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Magic Arrows
entries: The archer's ranged weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: The archer can take the {@action Hide} action when lightly obscured by natural phenomena.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Piercing Arrow {@recharge 5}
entries: The archer looses a magic arrow in a 30 foot by 1 foot line, passing harmlessly through objects and ignoring cover. Each creature in the line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

variant.name: Alternative Arrow Options
entries: You can also exchange any number of the archer's arrow options (Grasping Arrow or Shadow Arrow from Arcane Shot, or the Piercing Arrow action) by replacing it with the following options. These do not change the CR, but they do drastically affect how the archer plays in combat.
The following options are for the {@b {@i Arcane Shot}} ability.

items.name: Banishing Arrow
entries: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be banished to the ethereal plane. While in the ethereal plane in this manner, the target has a speed of 0 and is {@condition incapacitated}. At the end of its next turn, the target reappears in the space it vacated or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

items.name: Beguiling Arrow
entries: The target takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition charmed} by the archer until the start of the archer's next turn.

items.name: Detonating Arrow
entries: The target and all other creatures within 10 feet of the target take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) force damage.

items.name: Enfeebling Arrow
entries: The target takes 7 ({@dice 2d6}) necrotic damage, and it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or the damage dealt by its weapon attacks is halved until the start of the archer's next turn.
The following option is an action that the archer can take.

items.name: Seeking Arrow {@recharge 5}
entries: The archer makes a longbow attack against a creature it has seen in the past minute, even if the creature isn't in line of sight. The arrow flies around corners and obstacles. On a hit, the archer learns the target's location.
The following option is a reaction that the archer can take.

items.name: Curving Arrow
entries: When the archer misses a target with a ranged weapon attack, it can reroll the attack against a different target within 60 feet of the original target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The psi warrior's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following wizard spells.

trait.name: Psychic Strikes
entries: The psi warrior's weapon attacks are magical and deal an additional 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The psi warrior makes two weapon attacks. It can exchange one of these attacks for its Psi Strike or its Telekinetic Bulwark.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Psi Strike
entries: The psi warrior targets a creature it can see within 20 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage and is pushed or pulled up to 15 feet closer or further away (psi warrior's choice). On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't moved.

action.name: Telekinetic Bulwark (1/Day)
entries: The psi warrior projects a forcefield in a 10-foot radius around itself, which lasts for 1 minute or until the psi warrior is {@condition incapacitated}. The psi warrior and its allies within the area of effect gain the benefits of half cover and have advantage on Strength saving throws.

monster.name: Rune Scribe

skill.special: {@item calligrapher's supplies|phb} {@d20 6}, {@item mason's tools|phb} {@d20 3}, {@item woodcarver's tools|phb} {@d20 3}

languages: at least one of which is usually an exotic language

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The rune scribe is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can cast the following spells.

items.name: Ild Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) fire damage. This is a magic weapon.

items.name: Combustion {@recharge 5}
entries: The rune scribe marks the Ild Rune with ash on a creature within 5 feet of its position. The creature immediately takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

items.name: Ignite
entries: The rune scribe marks the Ild Rune with ash on a flammable object. That object immediately bursts into flames.

items.name: Fire Tamer
entries: The rune scribe traces the Ild Rune with its hand over an open flame. The rune scribe can manipulate the flame as per the {@spell control flames|XGE} spell.

items.name: Stein Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the rune scribe scores a critical hit, the target is knocked prone. This is a magic weapon that ignores resistances and immunities to bludgeoning damage.

items.name: Indomitable Stand
entries: The rune scribe scratches the Stein Rune with a chisel into the ground at its feet. Until it moves, it gains advantage on all ability checks and saving throws that would force it to move, and it can force a creature that moves within 10 feet of its position to succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or have its movement speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

items.name: Stone's Secrets
entries: The rune scribe scratches the Stein Rune with a chisel into a stone wall or ϐloor. It learns the location and size of any creatures touching the surface within 30 feet of its position at the moment it completes the rune.

items.name: Vind Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. While holding this magic weapon, the rune scribe does not suffer disadvantage due to range.

items.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

items.name: Kalt War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) cold damage. This is a magic weapon.

items.name: Frigid Touch
entries: The rune scribe traces the Kalt Rune with its foot over a body of water. The water freezes in a 10-foot radius around the rune.

items.name: Icy Mantle {@recharge}
entries: The rune scribe paints the Kalt Rune with water on itself or a willing creature, forming a mantle of ice that lasts for 1 minute. While the mantle is active, the next time the target takes damage, the damage is reduced to 0 and the mantle is destroyed.

trait.name: Draw
entries: The samurai deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) damage on the first attack it makes during the first turn of combat.

trait.name: Fighting Spirit (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the samurai gains 10 temporary hit points, plus advantage on melee weapon attacks until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Master of the Blade (1/Turn)
entries: When the samurai hits a creature with a melee weapon attack on the samurai's turn, the target takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) damage and the the samurai can apply one of the following bonuses to the attack.

trait.name: Disarming Attack
entries: The samurai chooses an item its target is holding. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or drop the object. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Pushing Attack
entries: On a hit, if the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the samurai.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The samurai makes three attacks with its katana.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack. This is a +2 magic weapon.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The samurai adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the samurai must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Steady Aim
entries: The sharpshooter's longbow attacks ignore half and three quarters cover and deal an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: World-Class Bowmanship
entries: If the sharpshooter has disadvantage on attack rolls made with its longbow, it can choose to ignore the disadvantage. If it does so, it cannot benefit from effects that would grant it advantage on the attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sharpshooter makes two attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The standard bearer's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells, requiring no material components.

trait.name: Bearer of Resolve
entries: Allied creatures that can see the standard bearer have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Saddle Master
entries: Mounting or dismounting a creature costs 5 feet of movement for the standard bearer. It has advantage on saving throws made to avoid falling off its mount, and if it falls, it can automatically land on its feet if it falls less than 10 feet and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The standard bearer makes two attacks with its pike or its longsword.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Hold the Line
entries: When a creature moves at least 1 foot while within 5 feet of the standard bearer (or within 10 feet while it wields its pike), the standard bearer can make an opportunity attack against that creature. If it hits, the creature's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its turn.

trait.name: Action Surge (1/Day)
entries: The survivalist takes one additional action on its turn.

trait.name: Padded Armor Expert
entries: While the survivalist wears padded armor, its AC is 16 plus its Constitution modifier. Any critical hit on the survivalist while it wears padded armor becomes a normal hit.

trait.name: Sylvan Spear
entries: The survivalist's spear attacks are magical. The survivalist has advantage on saving throws against spells cast by any creature hit by the survivalist's spear in the past minute. The survivalist can magically summon its spear to its hand as a bonus action. The spear loses its magic if the survivalist dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The survivalist makes two attacks with its spear.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

trait.name: Evasive Maneuvers
entries: When the martial arts master is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the martial arts master is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The martial arts master makes four unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. This is a magic weapon attack. If the target is a creature, the martial arts master can choose one of the following additional effects.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (martial arts master's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the martial arts master's next turn.

action.name: Improvised Missile
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (depending on the nature of the missile thrown).

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the martial arts master deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 15 ({@dice 2d10 + 4}). If the damage is reduced to 0, it catches the missile if it's small enough to hold in one hand and a hand is free. It can then make an improvised missile attack.

trait.name: Evasive Maneuvers
entries: When the enlightened master is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The enlightened master makes four enlightened strikes.

action.name: Enlightened Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the enlightened master can choose one of the following additional effects.
The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (enlightened master's choice).
The target must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition stunned} until the end of the enlightened master's next turn.

reaction.name: Reflect Missile
entries: When the enlightened master is targeted by a ranged weapon or spell attack, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1-3, the attack hits, but can't critically hit the enlightened master. On a roll of 4-6, the attack misses. In either case, the attacker must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 2d12}) force damage on a failed save, or half damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Astral Spirit
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Words of the Spirit
entries: When the astral spirit speaks, it can make its voice be heard up to 600 feet away. Alternatively, it can choose only certain creatures it can see within 30 feet of it to be able to hear its words.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The astral spirit makes two attacks with its astral arms.

action.name: Astral Arms
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the astral projector isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

trait.name: Words of the Spirit
entries: When the astral projector speaks, it can make its voice be heard up to 600 feet away. Alternatively, it can choose only certain creatures it can see within 30 feet of it to be able to hear its words.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The astral projector makes four attacks: two with its unarmed strike, and two with its astral arms.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Astral Arms
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) radiant damage.

variant.name: Mind Body Split
entries: When the astral projector is reduced to 0 hit points, it can separate its spirit from its body, dying and becoming two creatures: the {@creature astral spirit|OCLD} and {@creature body puppet|OCLD}. The body puppet dies if the astral spirit dies or if it starts its turn further than 600 feet from the astral spirit.

trait.name: Bleeding Edge
entries: As a bonus action, the bender reduces its hit points by any amount up to 7 and until the end of its turn increases its speed by 5 feet for each hit point lost in this manner. Alternatively, it can instead reduce its hit points by 7 to take the {@action Dodge} action.

trait.name: Fists of the Bloodied Soul
entries: The bender's unarmed strikes are considered to be magical for the purpose of overcoming damage resistances and immunities.

trait.name: Transfusion
entries: The bender regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hit points when it hits a creature with a melee attack, as long as that creature has blood and isn't an undead or a construct.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bender makes four unarmed strikes, or makes two unarmed strikes and uses its Dominion of Blood.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dominion of Blood
entries: The bender makes one unarmed strike against a target that has blood. On a hit, it can cast {@spell dominate person} on the target. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability for this spell (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). Once a creature has failed its saving throw against this spell, the bender can't use this action until it finishes a long rest.

action.name: Water Whip
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw.

On a failed save, the target takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} or pulled up to 25 feet toward the bender (bender's choice). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pulled or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mastery of Death (2/Day)
entries: When the death researcher is reduced to 0 hit points and not killed outright, it can choose to drop to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the death researcher isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The death researcher makes two attacks with its Death Strike.

action.name: Death Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage. If the damage from this attack reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the death researcher gains 13 ({@dice 2d10 + 2}) temporary hit points.

action.name: Empty Face {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the death researcher that can see it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} by it until the end of the death researcher's next turn.

trait.name: Deflect Missiles
entries: When the drunken master is hit by a ranged weapon attack, the damage is reduced by 25 ({@dice 1d10 + 20}).

trait.name: Drunkard's Luck (1/Turn)
entries: When the drunken master has disadvantage on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, it can choose either result for that roll.

trait.name: Drunken Technique
entries: The drunken master does not trigger opportunity attacks when it moves on its turn. Also, when {@condition prone}, the drunken master can spend 5 feet of movement to stand up.

trait.name: Ki Fists
entries: The drunken master's unarmed strikes are magical.

trait.name: Legendary Resistances (3/Day)
entries: When the drunken master fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Lucky (3/Day)
entries: The drunken master can re-roll an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw it makes and use either result.

trait.name: Slow Fall
entries: The drunken master takes no damage as a result of a fall.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the drunken master isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Flailing Arms
entries: The drunken master makes two unarmed strikes against each creature within 5 feet of its position.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature misses the drunken master with a melee attack roll, the drunken master can use its reaction to cause that attack to hit one creature of its choice, other than the attacker, that it can see within 5 feet of it.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gardener's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: The gardener adds its Wisdom modifier to its AC.

trait.name: Unforeseen Consequences
entries: After hitting a target with an unarmed strike, each subsequent unarmed strike for the next minute deals an additional 1 poison damage per hit. This extra damage stacks up to 10 extra damage per hit, and the minute resets with each hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gardener makes three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The glass shaterer's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Shatterstrike
entries: When the glass shatterer is at less than its hit point maximum, its unarmed strikes deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage. If the glass shatterer is at half its hit points or fewer, its unarmed strikes deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage on top of that.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the glass shatterer isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glass shatterer makes three unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Refraction
entries: When the glass shatterer takes fire, force, lightning, or radiant damage, it can reduce the damage taken by half.

trait.name: Agile Parry
entries: While wielding a melee weapon that isn't heavy, the kensei's armor class increases by 2 (included in the Armor Class).

trait.name: Kensei Weapons
entries: The kensei can use its Dexterity instead of its Strength for a melee weapons that isn't heavy. When it does so, its attacks with the weapon are magical.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the kensei isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kensei makes two attacks: one with its unarmed strike and one with its katana.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Deflect Missile
entries: In response to being hit by a ranged weapon attack, the kensei deflects the missile. The damage it takes from the attack is reduced by 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) and the missile is destroyed.

trait.name: Hands of Harm
entries: The warrior's unarmed strikes are magical and deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage on a hit (included in the attack). If the warrior hits a {@condition poisoned} or {@condition incapacitated} creature with an unarmed strike, it deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Noxious Aura
entries: As a bonus action, the warrior can activate or deactivate its noxious aura. While active, creatures that start their turn within 5 feet of the warrior must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} until the end of the warrior's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the warrior isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warrior makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Evasive Maneuvers
entries: When the quadruple master is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quadruple master makes four attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Fist of Unbroken Air
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is pushed 30 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, it is pushed 15 feet and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Fist of Four Thunders
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and each creature other than the bender within 10 feet of the quadruple master that can see and hear it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage.

legendary.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Water Whip
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 35 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 15 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} or pulled up to 30 feet toward the quadruple master. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pulled or knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The monk's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately without expending material components.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: When the monk is in dim light or darkness, as a bonus action it can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. The monk gains advantage on the next attack it makes before the end of its turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes two attacks with its punch dagger.

action.name: Punch Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Cloak of Shadows {@recharge 5}
entries: The monk becomes {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn, or until it attacks or casts a spell.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the monk isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monk makes two attacks with its Sun Bolt. It can then use its Radiant Swathe, if available.

action.name: Sun Bolt
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) radiant damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Radiant Swathe {@recharge 5}
entries: The monk swishes its hands through the air, creating a streak of white-hot light. Each creature in a 15-foot cone originating from the monk must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Diplomat
entries: The tranquil master has advantage on emotions or to counsel peace.

trait.name: Patient Defense
entries: The tranquil master can use its bonus action to take the {@action Dodge} action.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the tranquil master isn't wearing armor, its armor class includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tranquil master makes three attacks with its unarmed strike, or it makes two attacks with its unarmed strike then uses its Healing Hands.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Calming Touch
entries: The tranquil master touches a creature that is at its hit point maximum. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or lose its ability to attack for 1 minute. During that period, it also cannot cast spells that deal damage or that force a target to make a saving throw. The effect ends if the target is attacked, takes damage, or is forced to make a saving throw.

action.name: Healing Hands
entries: The tranquil master touches a willing creature. The target regains a number of hit points of the tranquil master's choice, drawn from its Healing Pool. Alternatively, the tranquil master can spend 5 hit points from its pool to cure one disease or one poison afflicting the target. The tranquil master has a pool of 20 hit points it can draw from to use its Healing Hands action. It replenishes the pool when it completes a long rest.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The oathkeeper is a 5th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: Friendly creatures within 10 feet of the oathkeeper have advantage on saving throws while the oathkeeper isn't {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oathkeeper makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Sacred Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage. This is a magic weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fiendbane is a 10th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Aura of Protection and Courage
entries: Friendly creatures within 10 feet of the fiendbane have advantage on saving throws and are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition while the fiendbane isn't {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fiendbane makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Fiendbane Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage. If the target is a fiend or a warlock of a fiend, it takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The fiendbane touches a willing creature. The target regains 10 hit points and is cleared of the {@condition poisoned} condition, if applicable, as well as any diseases.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mortal enemy of evil is a 15th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Adamantium Plate
entries: Any critical hit against the mortal enemy of evil becomes a regular hit.

trait.name: Aura of Protection and Courage
entries: Friendly creatures within 30 feet of the mortal enemy of evil have advantage on saving throws and are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition while the mortal enemy of evil isn't {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mortal enemy of evil makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Nemesis Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) radiant damage. If the target is a fiend or a warlock of a fiend, it takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage, and if the target is the paladin's nemesis, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the paladin until the end of the paladin's next turn. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
entries: The mortal enemy of evil touches a willing creature. The target regains 30 hit points and is cleared of the {@condition poisoned} condition, if applicable, as well as any diseases. Additionally, the mortal enemy of evil can end one spell affecting the target.

trait.name: Aura of Courage
entries: The aspect and friendly creatures within 30 feet of it can't be {@condition frightened} while the aspect is conscious.

trait.name: Sacred Weapons
entries: The aspect's weapon attacks are magical. When the aspect hits with its maul, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Vow of Enmity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the aspect targets a creature it can see.The vow lasts indefinitely. The aspect always knows in which direction its target can be found, and the aspect has advantage on attack rolls against the creature until the creature dies or the aspect chooses another target.The aspect can have only one creature targeted by this effect at a time.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aspect uses its Abjure Enemy, if it can. It then makes three attacks with its maul.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Abjure Enemy {@recharge 5}
entries: The aspect targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The creature must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, and the creature has disadvantage on its save if it is a fiend or undead. On a failed save, the the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. While {@condition frightened}, the creature's speed is 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to speed. On a successful save, the creature's speed is halved for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. This action has no effect on creatures immune to being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Vengeful Weapons
entries: The rival's weapon attacks are magical. When the rival hits with its maul, the weapon deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Vow of Enmity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the rival targets a creature that has wronged it that it can see within 60 feet of it. The vow lasts indefinitely. If the creature is on the same plane of existence as the rival, the rival knows in which direction its target can be found, and the rival has advantage on attack rolls against the creature until the creature dies or the rival chooses another target. The rival can have only one creature targeted by this effect at a time.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Vengeful Weapons
entries: The sworn foe's weapon attacks are magical. When the sworn foe hits with its maul, the weapon deals an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Vow of Enmity (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the sworn foe targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The vow lasts indefinitely. If the creature is on the same plane of existence as the sworn foe, the sworn foe knows in which direction its target can be found, and the sworn foe has advantage on attack rolls against the creature until the creature dies or the sworn foe chooses another target. The sworn foe can have only one creature targeted by this effect at a time.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sworn foe uses its Abjure Enemy, if it can. Then, it makes two attacks with its maul.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Abjure Enemy {@recharge 5}
entries: The aspect targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The creature must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. While {@condition frightened}, the creature's speed is 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to speed. On a successful save, the creature's speed is halved for 1 minute or until it takes any damage. This action has no effect on creatures immune to being {@condition frightened}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The feysworn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Aura of Warding
entries: The feysworn and friendly creatures within 30 feet of it have resistance to damage from spells.

trait.name: Sacred Weapons
entries: The feysworn's weapon attacks are magical. When the feysworn hits with its sickle, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The feysworn uses its Nature's Wrath, if it can. It then makes two attacks with its sickle.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Nature's Wrath {@recharge 5}
entries: The feysworn targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by magical vines for 1 minute. The target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Athlete
entries: The hero's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start. When the hero is {@condition prone}, standing up uses only 5 feet of its movement.

trait.name: Aura of Alacrity
entries: Allied creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the hero have their speed increased by 10 feet until the end of their turn.

trait.name: Inspiring Strikes (1/Turn)
entries: When the hero hits with a melee weapon attack, each allied creature within 30 feet of the hero regains 5 hit points.

action.name: Mythical Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage.
This is a +1 magic weapon.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lay on Hands (1/Day)
entries: The hero touches a willing creature. The target regains 15 hit points.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The redeemer is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Emissary of Redemption
entries: The redeemer's resistances don't function against creatures it has attacked or targeted with a spell since the last dawn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The redeemer makes two attacks with its quarterstaff.

action.name: Sacred Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is an evil-aligned creature, the attack deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

reaction.name: Protect the Innocent
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the redeemer takes damage, it can use its reaction to magically take that damage instead. The redeemer doesn't transfer any other effects that might accompany the damage, and this damage can't be reduced in any way.

reaction.name: Rebuke the Violent
entries: When the redeemer sees an attacker within 30 feet of it deal damage with an attack against a creature other than the paladin, it can use its reaction to force the attacker to make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker takes radiant damage equal to the damage it just dealt.
On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kingsguard's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately without expending somatic or material components.

trait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: The kingsguard and friendly creatures within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws.

trait.name: Sacred Weapons
entries: The kingsguard's weapon attacks are magical. When the kingsguard hits with its morningstar, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kingsguard makes three attacks with its morningstar.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Divine Sense (3/Day)
entries: Until the end of the kingsguard's next turn, it knows the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of it that is not behind total cover. It knows the type of creature but not its identity.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight conqueror's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Mark of the Conquered
entries: As a bonus action, the knight conqueror extends its finger towards a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target is marked until the start of the knight conqueror's next turn. While the target is marked, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than the knight conqueror.

trait.name: Righteous Might
entries: The knight conqueror scores a critical hit on a roll of 18, 19, or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight conqueror makes two attacks with its flail.

action.name: Conqueror's Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Conquering Presence (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the knight conqueror's choice that can see it within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition frightened} of the knight conqueror for 1 minute. The target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Aura of Treachery
entries: The mortal traitor has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has one or more of its allies within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Deceitful Nature
entries: The mortal traitor can use its bonus action to turn {@condition invisible} until the end of its next turn or until it attacks, deals damage, or forces a creature to make a saving throw. Additionally, the mortal traitor can choose to ignore the disadvantage imposed by heavy armor when it makes a Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mortal traitor makes two attacks with its flail.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage.

reaction.name: Treacherous Strike
entries: If a creature within 5 feet of the mortal traitor misses it with a melee attack, the mortal traitor can magically force it to reroll that attack against a creature of its choice that is within 5 feet of the attacker. This reaction fails if the attacker is immune to being {@condition charmed}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight is a 6th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Antiaura
entries: If a creature with an aura associated with paladins, such as an Aura of Protection, starts its turn within 30 feet of the antipaladin, the aura is disabled until the start of the creature's next turn. Additionally, a paladin's Divine Sense does not function (and is wasted) if the antipaladin is within 30 feet of the creature using the feature.

trait.name: Chilling Weapons
entries: The knight's weapon attacks are magical. When the knight hits with its longsword, the weapon deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage (included in the attack). Additionally, creatures hit by the antipaladin's attacks can't regain hit points until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The antipaladin makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 5 ({@damage 1d10}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight is a 9th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It has the following paladin spells prepared.

trait.name: Ancestral Knowledge
entries: The knight adds its Charisma modifier to its ability checks.

trait.name: Aura of the True Self
entries: The knight and allied creatures within 30 feet of its position have immunity to psychic damage and advantage on saving throws to resist being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Return Refreshed (1/Day)
entries: The knight chooses an ally within 30 feet of its position that has 0 hit points. The target regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Sacred Weapons
entries: The knight's weapon attacks are magical. When the knight hits with its scimitar, the weapon deals an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately without expending somatic or material components.

trait.name: Aura of the Exalted
entries: The knight and friendly creatures within 30 feet of the knight have advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws.

trait.name: Sacred Weapons
entries: The knight's weapon attacks are magical. When the knight hits with its halberd, the weapon deals an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes three attacks with its halberd.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Divine Sense (3/Day)
entries: Until the end of the knight's next turn, it knows the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of it that is not behind total cover. It knows the type of creature but not its identity.

monster.name: Watcher Knight
languages: one of which it shares with an ancient evil from which it has sworn to safeguard the world

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The watcher knight is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following paladin spells.

trait.name: Aura of the Sentinel
entries: The knight and up to 6 allied creatures of its choice within 30 feet of it have advantage on initiative rolls.

action.name: Halberd of Material Superiority
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) force damage if the creature is not from the material plane. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Abjure the Extraplanar (1/Day)
entries: Each elemental, fey, fiend, or aberration within 30 feet of the knight that can hear it must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage. A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from the knight as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of the knight. For its action, it can use only the {@action Dash} action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the {@action Dodge} action.

action.name: Divine Sense (3/Day)
entries: Until the end of the knight's next turn, it knows the location of any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet of it that is not behind total cover. It knows the type of creature but not its identity.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The knight's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately, requiring no material or somatic components.

trait.name: Aura of the Winter Knight
entries: Allied creatures within 30 feet of the knight have resistance to necrotic damage and cannot be {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or possessed by undead creatures. Hostile creatures that start their turn within this radius take 10 cold damage, and their movement speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Vow of Death
entries: Creatures reduced to 0 hit points by the knight are killed and cannot become undead or return to life through any method short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Winter Weapons
entries: The knight's weapon attacks are magical and deal an additional 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage on a hit (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The knight makes two attacks with its maul.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wild guardian's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately, without expending material components.

trait.name: Guardian Soul
entries: The wild guardian gains 20 temporary hit points at the beginning of each of its turns.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The wild guardian has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks.

trait.name: Wild Weapons
entries: The wild guardian's weapon attacks are magical and deal an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wild guardian makes four attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

action.name: Greatbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) force damage.

action.name: Entangling Thorns (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The wild guardian summons grasping vines in a 120 foot radius centered on itself. Each creature in the area of effect must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the entangling plants.

Creatures that start their turn {@condition restrained} by this effect take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage from thorns. An affected creature can be freed with a {@dc 19} Strength check. The vines are difficult terrain. All of the effects end after 1 minute or until the primeval guardian ends the effects as an action.

trait.name: Animal Companion
entries: The beastmaster is bonded to a beast, which is its animal companion. The companion acts on its own initiative, but otherwise obeys the beastmaster's commands. As a bonus action, the beastmaster can command its companion to use its reaction to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Dodge}, or {@action Help} action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beastmaster makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The dune diver is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following ranger spells.

trait.name: Sand Cover
entries: The dune diver has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in sandy terrain, and it can use its bonus action to do so. It also ignores the effects of difficult terrain caused by sand.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dune diver makes two attacks with its longbow or three attacks with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Sandy Defense
entries: When the dune diver is touching sandy terrain and is targeted by a ranged attack from an attacker it can see, it can magically impose disadvantage on the attack roll by protecting itself with a sheet of erupting sand.

trait.name: Enchanting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: A creature hit by the fey wanderer's attack must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} or {@condition charmed} of the fey wanderer (fey wanderer's choice) until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The fey wanderer's weapon attacks are magical and deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage on a hit (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The fey wanderer makes two attacks with its scimitars.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Surprise Attack (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the gloom stalker surprises a creature and hits it with an attack on the first turn of combat, the target takes an additional 9 ({@damage 2d8}) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Umbral Shroud
entries: While in darkness, the gloom stalker is {@condition invisible} to any creature that relies on darkvision to see it in that darkness.

trait.name: Vanish
entries: The gloom stalker can take the {@action Hide} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: On the first turn of combat, the gloom stalker makes two attacks with its darts.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned} by the darts for 1 hour. If the target fails this save by 5 or more, it is also {@condition unconscious} while {@condition poisoned} in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

reaction.name: Shadowy Dodge
entries: When a creature targets the gloom stalker with an attack, the gloom stalker can use its reaction to impose disadvantage on that attack.

trait.name: Disarming Attack (1/Turn)
entries: When the herbalist hits a creature with an attack from its shortsword or shortbow, it can choose to force the target to succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or take an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the attack and drop an object it is holding of the herbalist's choice. The object lands at its feet.

trait.name: Poisoned Weapons
entries: The herbalist's weapon attacks deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Poultice (3/Day)
entries: The herbalist spends 1 minute to apply a poultice to a wounded creature. That creature regains 14 ({@dice 4d6}) hit points. Alternatively, it can use this ability to cure the creature of one poison afflicting it.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Distant Strike
entries: When the horizon walker takes the Multiattack action, it can teleport up to 10 feet before or after each attack to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the horizon walker can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The horizon walker makes three attacks with its subtle knife. Each attack must be against a different target.

action.name: Subtle Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d4 + 2d8 + 2}) force damage. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell), the horizon walker can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Detect Portal (3/Day)
entries: The horizon walker magically detects the direction and distance to the nearest planar portal or planar gash (a small hidden connection between worlds, a potential planar portal) on the same plane of existence as it.

action.name: Open Portal
entries: The horizon walker targets a hidden planar gash with its subtle knife, creating a one-way portal to a randomly-determined plane of existence. The portal stays open until the end of the horizon walker's next turn; the horizon walker can use its action to keep the portal open.

reaction.name: Spectral Defense
entries: When the horizon walker takes damage from an attack, it can give itself resistance to the damage of the attack.

items.name: Subtle Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d4 + 2d8 + 2}) force damage. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell), the horizon walker can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage. This is a magic weapon.

legendary.name: Open Portal to the Elemental Plane of Air
entries: The horizon walker uses its subtle knife to open a two-way portal to the Elemental Plane of Air. Until the end of the Horizon Walker's next turn, the portal stays open and emanates a gust of wind in a 60 foot by 5 foot line. Creatures that start their turn in the area of effect must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed 30 feet in the direction of the wind. Ranged weapon attacks that pass through the area of effect are made with disadvantage. A creature moving against the wind must spend 3 feet of movement for every 1 foot moved.

legendary.name: Open Portal to the Elemental Plane of Earth (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The horizon walker uses its subtle knife to open a two-way portal to the Elemental Plane of Earth. The portal opens and immediately closes. A 10 foot high, 5 foot wide, and 30 foot long wall of stone appears next to the portal in a configuration of the horizon walker's choice. The wall has an AC of 18 and 100 hit points.

legendary.name: Open Portal to the Elemental Plane of Fire (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The horizon walker uses its subtle knife to open a two-way portal to the Elemental Plane of Fire. The portal opens and immediately closes. Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from the portal must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage as a successful one.

legendary.name: Open Portal to the Elemental Plane of Water
entries: The horizon walker uses its subtle knife to open a two-way portal to the Elemental Plane of Air. The portal opens and immediately closes. Creatures in a 20-foot cube originating from the portal must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

trait.name: Colossus Slayer (1/Turn)
entries: The hunter deals an additional 4 ({@damage 1d8}) damage with its weapons when it hits a creature below its hit point maximum.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing and sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes two ranged attacks then one additional ranged attack against a creature within 5 feet of one of the original targets.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Giant Killer
entries: After a Large or larger creature targets the hunter with a melee weapon attack, the hunter can make one weapon attack against that creature after its attack is resolved.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The monster hunter's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately, without expending material components.

trait.name: Hunter's Sense (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the monster hunter examines a creature it can see within 60 feet of it, discerning whether the creature has any damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities and what they are. If the creature is hidden from divination magic, it senses that it has no damage immunities, resistances, or vulnerabilities.

trait.name: Slayer's Prey
entries: As a bonus action, the monster hunter designates one creature it can see within 60 feet of it as its prey. The first time on the monster hunter's turn that it hits its prey with a weapon attack, the prey takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage from the weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The monster hunter makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Adaptive Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (the monster hunter's choice). This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Slayer's Counter
entries: When the monster hunter's prey forces it to make a saving throw, the monster hunter can use its reaction to immediately make one weapon attack against the prey, which it makes before the saving throw. If the attack hits, the monster hunter automatically succeeds on the saving throw against the prey's effect.

trait.name: Shadow Thrall
entries: The nightstalker has a shadowy thrall which relies on the nightstalker to determine how it acts during combat. The nightstalker can summon or dismiss its thrall as a bonus action. The thrall appears within 5 feet of the nightstalker when summoned. The thrall is automatically dismissed if the nightstalker starts its turn more than 120 feet from its thrall. The thrall has the base speed of the animal form it has taken, plus it gains a flying speed of 30 feet if it can't fly already. As a bonus action, the nightstalker can magically swap places with its thrall. The thrall is an illusion. Attacks made against the thrall automatically miss. It cannot be made to make a saving throw. It is immune to magical effects. Truesight and other methods of seeing through illusions reveal the animal to be nothing more than a twitching black ball of dark energy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nightstalker makes two attacks. It can replace one of its attacks with either its Thrall Strike action or its wolf's Piercing Howl.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Thrall Strike
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target within 5 feet of its animal thrall. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage. The animal thrall can move up to its speed before or after making this attack.

action.name: Send Thrall
entries: The nightstalker's thrall moves up to its speed.

action.name: Piercing Howl (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The wolf lets out a terrifying howl. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of the nightstalker for 1 minute. An affected creature can remake this save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Guardian Soul
entries: The primeval guardian gains 10 temporary hit points at the beginning of each of its turns.

trait.name: Rooted Defense
entries: The ground within 30 feet of the guardian is difficult terrain.

trait.name: Sylvan Thorns
entries: The guardian's weapon attacks are magical. When the primeval guardian hits a creature with a slam attack, it deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The guardian makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Entangle
entries: The primeval guardian summons grasping vines in a 20-foot square centered on a point the primeval guardian can see within 60 feet of its position.

Each creature in the area of effect must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the entangling plants. An affected creature can be freed with a {@dc 14} Strength check. The vines are difficult terrain. All of the effects end after 1 minute or until the primeval guardian ends the effects as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The Swarm is a 13th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following ranger spells prepared.

spells: {@spell mage hand} (the hand takes the form of swarming creatures)

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Swarm makes two vortex attacks.

action.name: Writhing Vortex
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (The Swarm's choice).

action.name: Storm of Minions {@recharge 5}
entries: The Swarm summons a 30 ft. radius sphere of enraged swarming minions centred on a point it can see within 120 feet of it. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) necrotic damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. The Swarm is unaffected by its storm of minions. The Swarm is healed by the total amount of damage dealt.

legendary.name: Swarm Splitter
entries: The Swarm summons a {@creature swarm of insects} (or another swarm) by sacrificing hit points equal to the total hit points of the summoned swarm. The summoned swarm appears in an unoccupied or occupied space within 5 feet of The Swarm.

legendary.name: Swarming Tide
entries: The Swarm moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Blood Drain
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the swarm drains the blood of one creature within its space. The creature loses 10 ({@dice 4d4}) hit points due to blood loss, or 5 ({@dice 2d4}) hit points if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny stirge. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Attach
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature. {@h}The swarm attaches to the target.
While attached, the swarm can move up to its speed on the target's turn to remain in the target's space. The target can detach itself from the swarm by succeeding on a {@dc 13} Strength check.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny velociraptor. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) piercing damage, or 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The attack roll is made with advantage.

monster.name: Swarm of Demiliches
languages: the languages each demilich in the swarm knew in life

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the swarm is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Swarm Resistance
entries: The swarm has advantage on all saving throws.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny demilich. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The swarm is immune to effects that turn undead.

action.name: Mulitattack
entries: The swarm uses its howls and its life drains.

action.name: Howls
entries: The swarm emits several bloodcurdling howls. Each creature within 90 feet of the swarm that can hear the howls must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or drop to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. When the swarm is at half its hit points or fewer, the range of its howls is reduced to 30 ft.

action.name: Life Drains
entries: The swarm targets all creatures in its space plus up to three creatures within 30 feet of it. Each target must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. When the swarm is at half its hit points or fewer, creatures take no damage on a successful save.

legendary.name: Clouds of Dust
entries: The swarm magically swirls its dusty remains. Each creature within 30 feet of the swarm, including around a corner, must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the swarm's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the swarm's next turn. After swirling its dusty remains, the swarm can move up to its flying speed without provoking opportunity attacks as long as it has half its hit points or more.

legendary.name: Energy Drain
entries: Each creature within 90 feet of the swarm must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or have its point maximum magically reduced by 31 ({@dice 9d6}) on a failed save. If a creature's hit point maximum is reduced to 0 by this effect, the creature dies. A creature's hit point maximum can be restored with the {@spell greater restoration} spell or similar magic. If the swarm is at half its hit points or fewer, the range of its energy drain is reduced to 30 ft, and it costs 2 actions.

legendary.name: Howls (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The swarm uses its howls. If the swarm is at half hit points or fewer, this legendary action costs 3 actions.

legendary.name: Vile Curse (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The swarm targets up to three creatures it can see within 90 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be magically cursed. Until the curse ends, a target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on a success. If the swarm is at half its hit points or fewer, the range of its vile curse is reduced to 30 ft, and it costs 3 actions.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warden's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The warden is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared.

trait.name: Follow Prey
entries: The warden has advantage on checks to track a target, and its passive Perception is increased by 5.

trait.name: Longbow Specialist
entries: The warden ignores half cover and three quarters cover when it makes attacks with its longbow, and it has a +2 to ranged weapon attack rolls (included in the attack).

trait.name: Tracker's Mark
entries: As a bonus action, the warden chooses one target within 60 feet of its position that it can see, or replaces its mark with a new target it can see within range. The bounty hunter's weapon attacks ignore any damage resistances of the marked target and deal an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warden makes two attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage

trait.name: Evasive
entries: When the crime boss is targeted by an effect that forces the crime boss to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds and half if it fails.

trait.name: Elusive
entries: No attack roll has advantage against the crime boss while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the crime boss fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Loyal Goons
entries: When the crime boss is targeted by an attack and an ally is within 10 feet of it, the crime boss's ally can use its reaction to swap places with the crime boss, and the ally becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: The crime boss can use the {@action Help} action as a bonus action. When used to assist an ally in attacking a creature, the target of the attack can be within 30 feet of the crime boss.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The crime boss deals an extra 24 ({@damage 7d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the crime boss that isn't incapacitated and the crime boss doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crime boss makes two attacks with its rapier.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The crime boss halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The crime boss must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Evasive
entries: When the crime boss is targeted by an effect that forces the crime boss to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds and half if it fails.

trait.name: Elusive
