entries: No attack roll has advantage against the crime boss while it isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When the crime boss fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Loyal Goons
entries: When the crime boss is targeted by an attack and an ally is within 10 feet of it, the crime boss's ally can use its reaction to swap places with the crime boss, and the ally becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: The crime boss can use the {@action Help} action as a bonus action. When used to assist an ally in attacking a creature, the target of the attack can be within 30 feet of the crime boss.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The crime boss deals an extra 42 ({@damage 12d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the crime boss that isn't incapacitated and the crime boss doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crime boss makes two attacks with its rapier.

action.name: Rapier of Warning
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. This is a magic weapon. While the crime lord is attuned to the rapier, the crime lord has advantage on initiative rolls and can't be surprised.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The crime lord halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The crime lord must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Arcane Thief
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The thief is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following wizard spells.

trait.name: Invisible Hand
entries: The thief gains additional benefits when it casts {@spell mage hand}. For a creature to notice the hand or the tasks the hand is performing, it must succeed on a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

items: The hand created by the spell is {@condition invisible}.
The thief can use the hand to stow or retrieve one object into or from a container worn or carried by another creature, or to use its {@item Thieves' Tools|phb}.

The thief can use its bonus action to control the hand, or to distract a creature within range of the spell. If it distracts a creature, it gains advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the thief's turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The thief deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn't incapacitated and the thief doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Discount Assassin
languages: Thieves' cant plus any one language

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The assassin has advantage on attack rolls against creatures it has surprised.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't incapacitated and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Poisoned Blowgun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 25/100 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

monster.name: Guerilla Scout
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Guerilla Fighter
entries: The scout has advantage on initiative checks. The scout can ignore the limitation of 1 use of sneak attack per turn if each use of it is against a different surprised enemy and as long as the requirements for sneak attack are otherwise met.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The scout deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the scout that isn't incapacitated and the scout doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scout makes three attacks on the first turn of combat.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the scout, the scout can move up to 20 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Inquisitor
languages: Thieves' cant plus any three languages

trait.name: Eye for Detail
entries: The inquisitor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) and Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The inquisitor deals an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the inquisitor that isn't incapacitated and the inquisitor doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. The inquisitor also doesn't need advantage if it has detected the presence of deceptive magic from its target creature using its Unerring Eye.

trait.name: Unerring Eye (3/Day)
entries: The inquisitor can use a bonus action to sense the presence of illusions, shapechangers not in their original form, and other magic designed to deceive the senses within 30 feet of it, provided it isn't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}. The inquisitor senses only the presence of these effects, not their form.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The inquisitor adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the inquisitor must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Mastermind
languages: Thieves' cant plus any four languages

trait.name: Loyal Goons
entries: When the mastermind is targeted by an attack and an ally is within 5 feet of it, the mastermind's ally can use its reaction to swap places with the mastermind, and the ally becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: The mastermind can use the {@action Help} action as a bonus action. When used to assist an ally in attacking a creature, the target of the attack can be within 30 feet of the mastermind.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The mastermind deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the mastermind that isn't incapacitated and the mastermind doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Soul of Deceit
entries: The mastermind's thoughts can't be read by telepathy or other means. The mastermind can present false thoughts by succeeding on a Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check contested by the mind reader's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. Additionally, the mastermind is unaffected by magic that would compel it to tell the truth; instead, such magic always indicates that the mastermind is truthful.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: The Phantom
languages: Thieves' cant plus any four languages

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The phantoms's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the phantom can magically shift from the material plane to the ethereal plane, or vice versa. If the phantom shifts and then makes a weapon attack against a creature within 5 feet of where the phantom appeared, it has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Undead Nature
entries: The phantom doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The phantom deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the phantom that isn't incapacitated and the phantom doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Privateer
languages: Thieves cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: The privateer can take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} actions as a bonus action on its turn.

trait.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: During the privateer's turn, if it makes a melee attack against a creature, that creature cannot make opportunity attacks against it until the end of the privateer's turn.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The privateer deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of the privateer and has no allies within 5 feet of it, as long as the privateer doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The privateer makes two attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Shadow Rogue
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

spellcasting.name: Shadowy Magic
headerEntries: The rogue and the shadow share the same innate spellcasting abilities, drawing from the same pool of available spells. Spells unavailable to the rogue also become unavailable to the shadow, and vice versa. Their shared innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 10}, {@hit 2} to hit with spell attacks). They can cast the following spells.

trait.name: Shadow Pact
entries: The rogue casts no shadow. It has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks in dim light or darkness. Its  shadow, represented by the {@creature shadow|MM} statblock, has a mental connection with the rogue while they are within 500 feet of each other. Within this range, they have two-way telepathy. Additionally, as a bonus action, they can teleport to the other's location as long as they are both on the same plane of existence. They also share the Black Eyes action.

trait.name: Shadowy Resurrection
entries: If the rogue or the shadow are killed, a member of the pair that is still alive can spend 1 hour to resurrect the other as long as 30 days have not passed. If the rogue leaves behind a body, it disintegrates. The resurrected rogue or shadow reappears within 5 feet of the resurrector.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage. The rogue deals an additional 10 ({@dice 3d6}) necrotic damage if it has advantage on the attack roll or if its shadow is within 5 feet of the target and isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Black Eyes
entries: The rogue becomes blind and deaf through its own senses and instead sees and hears through the senses of the shadow, or vice versa. Either the rogue or the shadow can end this effect as an action.

monster.name: Psionic Assassin
languages: Thieves' cant plus any two languages

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the assassin has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the assassin scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Psionic Armor
entries: The assassin adds its Intelligence modifier to its armor class.

trait.name: Rend Mind (1/Turn)
entries: The assassin deals an extra 42 ({@damage 12d6}) psychic damage when it hits a target with its soul knife and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the assassin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the assassin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll. A creature that takes this damage must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the assassin until the start of the assassin's next turn. On a successful save, the creature isn't {@condition frightened} and is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The assassin makes two attacks with its soul knives.

action.name: Soul Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon that can be summoned or dismissed by the assassin at will.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The assassin magically turns {@condition invisible} until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the assassin wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Aura of Reality Warping
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the sorcerer takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage as its mind is addled with rippling psychic energy.

action.name: Mind Sliver
entries: The sorcerer telepathically links minds with a creature within 60 feet of it that knows at least one language. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and incur disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of the sorcerer's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following sorcerer spells.

action.name: Mind Sliver
entries: The sorcerer telepathically links minds with a creature within 60 feet of it that knows at least one language. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Intelligence saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage and incur disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of the sorcerer's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 20th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Aura of Reality Warping
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the sorcerer takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage as its mind is addled with rippling psychic energy.

trait.name: Careful Spell
entries: The sorcerer's allies automatically succeed on saving throws against its spells.

trait.name: Subtle Spell
entries: The sorcerer doesn't need to use somatic or verbal components to cast spells.

action.name: Mind Sliver
entries: The sorcerer telepathically links minds with a creature within 60 feet of it that knows at least one language. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage and incur disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of the sorcerer's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Absolute Order
entries: When making an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check, the clockwork soul can treat a roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Aura of Balance
entries: When a creature the clockwork soul can see within 30 feet of it rolls with advantage or disadvantage, the clockwork soul can choose to prevent the roll from being affected by advantage or disadvantage.

trait.name: As All Things Should Be
entries: After casting {@spell shield} or {@spell counterspell}, the clockwork soul regains a 1st-level spell slot.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The clockwork soul uses Restore Balance. It can then cast a spell.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Restore Balance
entries: The clockwork soul ends one magical effect or condition affecting it.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 20th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Absolute Order
entries: When making an attack roll, saving throw, or ability check, the clockwork soul can treat a roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

trait.name: Aura of Balance
entries: When a creature the clockwork soul can see within 30 feet of it rolls with advantage or disadvantage, the clockwork soul can choose to prevent the roll from being affected by advantage or disadvantage.

trait.name: As All Things Should Be
entries: After casting {@spell shield} or {@spell counterspell}, the clockwork soul regains a 1st-level spell slot.

trait.name: Extended Spell
entries: The sorcerer's spells have double their usual duration, up to a maximum of 24 hours.

trait.name: Quickened Spell
entries: As a bonus action, the sorcerer casts a spell with a usual casting time of one action. The sorcerer's action on this turn can not be used to cast a spell of 1st level or higher.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Restore Balance
entries: The clockwork soul ends one magical effect or condition affecting it. The clockwork soul can take this action even if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following spells innately.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells.

action.name: Possession {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid that the sorcerer can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the sorcerer; the sorcerer then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The sorcerer now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. While doing so, the sorcerer is considered to be undead. The sorcerer can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment and its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the sorcerer ends it as a bonus action, or the sorcerer is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel good and evil} spell. When the possession ends, the sorcerer reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to the sorcerer's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

entries: The sorcerer can force one creature targeted by its spell to roll the first saving throw of the spell with disadvantage.

The sorcerer now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. While doing so, the sorcerer is considered to be undead. The sorcerer can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment and its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the sorcerer ends it as a bonus action, or the sorcerer is forced out by an effect like the {@spell dispel good and evil} spell. When the possession ends, the sorcerer reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to the sorcerer's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 10th-level spellcaster. The sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Burning Aura
entries: When a creature hits the sorcerer with a melee attack, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Glowing Skin
entries: As a bonus action, the sorcerer can activate or deactivate its glowing skin. While active, it sheds bright light in a 30 foot radius and dim light 30 feet beyond that.

trait.name: Phoenix Spark (1/Day)
entries: When the sorcerer is reduced to 0 hit points, it can instead choose to drop to 1 hit point. If it does so, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Untamed Flame
entries: When the sorcerer rolls fire damage on its turn, it deals an additional 5 fire damage to each affected creature.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 6th-level spellcaster. The sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The sorcerer can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Curse of the Sea
entries: When a sorcerer targets a creature with a spell that deals cold damage, deals lightning damage, or forces the target to move, the target suffers additional effects on a hit or on a failed save, as listed below.

trait.name: Cold Damage
entries: The target's speed is reduced by 15 feet.

trait.name: Lightning Damage
entries: The target takes an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.
Forced movement. The target is moved an additional 15 feet.

trait.name: Watery Form
entries: The sorcerer can move through a space as narrow as 3 inches wide without squeezing.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage or 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Watery Defense
entries: When a creature hits the sorcerer with an attack, the sorcerer can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Darkness Incarnate
entries: The sorcerer can cast {@spell darkness} at will as a bonus action without expending verbal or material components. The sorcerer can ignore the restrictions related to casting spells as a bonus action if it does so.

trait.name: Douser of Light
entries: Natural fires and other light sources not worn or carried by a creature are magically extinguished when the sorcerer starts its turn within 30 feet of them. While not in direct sunlight, the sorcerer can choose to magically appear as a black silhouette, granting it advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the sorcerer to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 plus the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the sorcerer drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Summon Hound of Ill Omen (1/Day)
entries: The sorcerer summons a {@creature shadow mastiff|VGM} or {@creature hell hound} to an empty space within 30 feet of it. The summoned hound is fiercely loyal to the sorcerer and returns from whence it came after 1 minute or when the sorcerer dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

entries: Natural fires and other light sources not worn or carried by a creature are magically extinguished when the sorcerer starts its turn within 10 feet of them.

trait.name: Darkness Incarnate
entries: The sorcerer can cast {@spell darkness} at will as a bonus action without expending verbal or material components. The sorcerer can ignore the restrictions related to casting spells as a bonus action if it does so.

trait.name: Douser of Light
entries: Natural fires and other light sources not worn or carried by a creature are magically extinguished when the sorcerer starts its turn within 30 feet of them. The sorcerer has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

trait.name: Shadow Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the sorcerer's darkvision.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Summon Monster of Ill Omen (1/Day)
entries: The sorcerer summons a {@creature gray render|MTF} or {@creature hydra|MM} to an empty space within 30 feet of it, or a {@creature hell hound|MM} or {@creature shadow mastiff|MM} that uses either of the above monsters' statistics. The summoned monster is fiercely loyal to the sorcerer and returns from whence it came after 1 minute or when the sorcerer dismisses it as an action.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is an 8th-level spellcaster. The sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Blessed by Stone
entries: The sorcerer's weapon attacks are magical. When the sorcerer hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it deals an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Earth Aegis
entries: Up to three friendly creatures of the sorcerer's choice within 30 feet of it also benefit from the sorcerer's resistances to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorcerer makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) force damage. This is a magic weapon.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The sorcerer can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Breath of the Wind
entries: The sorcerer doesn't trigger opportunity attacks when it flies out of a hostile creature's reach.

trait.name: Conductor of the Wind
entries: The sorcerer can use its bonus action to change the direction of the wind within a 100-foot radius around it. The sorcerer can choose the direction but not the strength of the wind.

action.name: Lightning Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) lightning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. This is a magic weapon.

reaction.name: Wind's Lash
entries: When the sorcerer is hit by an attack, it can use its reaction to force its attacker to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage and is pushed 20 feet in a direction of the sorcerer's choice. On a successful save, the target takes no damage and is pushed 10 feet.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The sorcerer is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It knows the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Misty Escape
entries: When the sorcerer drops to 0 hit points, it can instead drop to 1 hit point and cast {@spell gaseous form} on itself without expending a spell slot or components.
If it can't cast this spell, it drops to 0 hit points as usual.

trait.name: Partial Regeneration
entries: The sorcerer gains 10 temporary hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If it starts its turn in sunlight or running water, it gains 5 temporary hit points instead, replacing any temporary hit points it might have gained through other sources. This trait doesn't function if the sorcerer is prevented from regaining hit points on its turn, such as through the {@spell chill touch} spell.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The sorcerer can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny bat or back into its true form.
While in bat form, the sorcerer can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged.
Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sorcerer makes two unarmed strikes. It can swap one unarmed strike with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: The sorcerer bites a creature it is grappling. The target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage, and the sorcerer regains the same number of hit points.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the sorcerer can grapple the target (escape {@dc 13}). This is a magic weapon attack.

trait.name: Wild Magic Surge
entries: When the sorcerer casts a spell of 1st-level or higher, it rolls twice on the {@table Wild Magic Surge|PHB} table and uses either result.

trait.name: Wild Magic Surge

trait.name: Aurora (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the faith seeker activates an aurora in a 10-foot radius around itself until the end of its next turn. While the aurora is active, the faith seeker has resistance to all damage, and if a hostile creature ends its turn within the radius, it takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Star Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage. This is a magic weapon.

monster.name: Hexblade Wielder
languages: plus one language shared with its bonded weapon

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hexblade wielder is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells.

trait.name: Hexblade
entries: The hexblade wielder is bonded to a sentient weapon, for which it uses its Charisma modifier for its attack and damage rolls. The hexblade wielder and its weapon can communicate telepathically, and the hexblade wielder obeys its bonded weapon's commands. The hexblade wielder can use its bonus action to teleport its bonded weapon into a free hand, or a bonus action to temporarily dismiss the bonded weapon into a pocket dimension. If the hexblade wielder spends at least 1 hour without touching its bonded weapon, the hexblade wielder dies and the weapon appears in an empty space within 10 feet of it.

trait.name: Weapon Bond: Blackrazor.
entries: The hexblade wielder's bonded weapon is {@item Blackrazor}, a chaotic neutral sentient greatsword that can speak Common and Deep Speech (Int 21, Wis 17, Cha 25). {@item Blackrazor} is a legendary +3 magic weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hexblade wielder makes three attacks with its bonded weapon.

action.name: Blackrazor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. If a critical hit is scored with {@item Blackrazor}, the wielder rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this weapon, it dies; its body is destroyed, its soul is absorbed by {@item Blackrazor}, and the hexblade wielder gains 54 ({@dice 12d6}) temporary hit points. This is a +3 magic weapon.

trait.name: Death Defier (3/Day)
entries: When the undying succeeds on a death saving throw or stabilises a creature with spare the dying, it regains 11 ({@dice 2d8 + 2}) hit points.

trait.name: Undying Nature
entries: The undying can hold its breath indefinitely, and it doesn't require food, water, or sleep. Additionally, undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against the undying, and the undying has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects created by undead.

At the start of each of the warlock's turns, it drains 10 hit points from that creature, increasing its own hit points by the amount drained. The warlock can dismiss such a bond as a bonus action. It can have up to three bonded creatures at the same time.

action.name: Shared Fate

On a failed save, whenever the warlock takes damage, the target takes the same amount of damage as necrotic damage. The target can remake the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

items.entry: The target's vision is obscured by illusory fog, giving them disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made against creatures more than 15 feet from them. Creatures that can see through illusions are unaffected.

items.entry: The target's speed is reduced to 0.

entries: In response to being targeted with an attack roll, the warlock can prevent the attacker from making any further attacks against the warlock until the start of the warlock's next turn.

trait.name: Raven Queen's Servant
entries: The warlock has a familiar in the form of a {@creature raven}. While the raven is perched on its shoulder, it cannot be targeted by attacks, spells, or other harmful effects, it can't take damage, and it is {@condition incapacitated} until the warlock releases it from its shoulder as a bonus action. The warlock can perceive through the raven's senses at will (remaining aware through its own senses) and the raven can use its action to teleport to a space within 5 feet of the warlock as long as they are on the same plane of existence. The raven doesn't sleep and can wake the warlock as a bonus action if it is within 100 feet of it. The raven vanishes if it or the warlock are killed.

trait.name: Raven's Gifts
entries: If the warlock's raven isn't perched on its shoulder, it loses its darkvision and its proficiency in {@skill Perception}.

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

entries: The raven servant does not appear undead. A {@dc 18} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check can determine the raven servant's undead nature.

trait.name: Fey Resilience
entries: Magic can't put the warlock to sleep.

action.name: Thunderclap
entries: The warlock emits a burst of sound that can be heard up to 100 feet away. Each creature that can hear the thunderclap within 15 feet of the warlock must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bladesinger is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared.

trait.name: Bladesong
entries: While the bladesinger isn't wearing Medium or Heavy armor or using a shield, its AC includes its Intelligence modifier, and it has advantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain concentration on a spell.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The bladesinger has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

trait.name: Victorious Blades
entries: The bladesinger's melee weapon attacks are magical, and it adds its Intelligence modifier to the weapon's damage (included in the attack). The bladesinger can also use its Dexterity to wield onehanded weapons that aren't heavy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bladesinger makes two attacks with its scimitar.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d6 + 9}) slashing damage.

variant.name: Bladesinger Styles
entries: The statblock above represents a bladesinger of the Red Tiger style. Your NPC bladesinger might be affiliated with a different bladesinger faction and as a result wield a different weapon, such as a whip or a longsword. It uses its Dexterity for any one-handed melee weapon it wields. Changing the bladesinger's weapon does not affect its challenge rating

items.name: Lion Bladesinger.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chronomancer is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared.

spells: {@spell time stop} (considered to be a 7th-level spell)

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The chronomancer can take an unlimited number of reactions.

action.name: Improved Ready Action
entries: The chronomancer readies a spell without needing to concentrate. It can then cast a spell with a casting time of one action.

reaction.name: Chronostasis (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the chronomancer takes damage, it can cast either haste targeting itself or slow centred on itself (excluding itself from the area of effect) without expending a spell slot or using components for either. If it does so, the chronomancer does not need to concentrate on either spell.

reaction.name: Drift Together
entries: When a creature the chronomancer can see casts {@spell time stop}, the chronomancer can also cast {@spell time stop} if it can, expending a spell slot and using components as normal. While time stop is active for both the target and the chronomancer, their turns alternate starting at the top of initiative.

items.name: Blood Pact
entries: The hemomancer can reduce its hit points by 5 to cast a spell of first level without expending a spell slot. It can cast spells at higher level using this trait, but it must expend an additional 5 hit points for each level of the spell above 1st.

items.name: Deepen Wound
entries: When the hemomancer hits a creature that is below its hit point maximum with a spell, the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

spellcasting.name: Reckless Spellcasting
headerEntries: The inventor is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its reckless spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). When the inventor casts a spell, it rolls a {@dice d10} twice from the list of cantrips or the list of spells of the same level of the spell slot consumed and chooses either result. If the inventor rolls a 10 and chooses to roll again, it can cast both of the new results, but if either of the new results are 10, it wastes the action and the spell slot. It knows the following wizard spells.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The inventor is incapacitated while it wears its armor in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic} while wearing its armor, the inventor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become incapacitated for 1 minute.

action.name: Arcanomechanical Blast
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting

trait.name: Elemental Secrets (1/Turn)
entries: When the lore master deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, it can substitute that damage type with one other type from that list.

trait.name: Secrets of the Body and Mind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the lore master casts a spell that forces the target to make a saving throw, the lore master can change the saving throw from one ability score to another of its choice.

action.name: Pencil
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wizard is a 10th-level spellcaster. The wizard's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following wizard spells.

trait.name: Shrouded Arts
entries: The wizard requires no spellbook, committing its spells to memory instead. It can replace any verbal components of its spells with somatic components instead.

trait.name: Shroud of Oblivion
entries: The wizard wears a magical shroud that grants it certain innate spellcasting abilities. The wizard's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately, using the shroud as its focus.
At will: {@spell disguise self}, {@spell nondetection}
3/day each: {@spell greater invisibility}, {@spell modify memory}
1/day each: {@spell mind blank}, {@spell Nystul's magic aura}

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The theurge is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard and cleric spells prepared.

trait.name: Knowledge of the Ages (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the theurge chooses one skill or tool and gains proficiency in it until they use this ability again.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Read Thoughts
entries: The theurge targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the target is immune to this effect for 24 hours. On a failed save, for 1 minute, the theurge can read the target's surface thoughts while it is within 60 feet of the theurge.
During that time, the theurge can use its action to end the effects and cast {@spell suggestion} without spending a spell slot; the target automatically fails its saving throw against suggestion.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The wizard is a 6th-level spellcaster. The wizard's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared.

trait.name: Combat Caster
entries: The wizard has advantage on concentration on a spell. While the wizard maintains concentration on a spell, it has a +3 bonus to AC and all saving throws.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Arcane Deflection
entries: When the wizard is hit by an attack or it fails a saving throw, it can use its reaction to gain a +3 bonus to its AC against that attack or a +6 bonus to that saving throw. Additionally, up to three creatures of the wizard's choice that it can see within 60 feet of it each take 10 ({@damage 4d4}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The witch is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared.

trait.name: Potions
entries: The witch has six infused potions. It has infused them with the following spells (spell save DC 13, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks), which it expends as part of drinking or throwing the potion.
Infusions (1 potion each): {@spell bestow curse}, {@spell death ward}, {@spell dispel magic}, {@spell invisibility}, {@spell lesser restoration}, {@spell polymorph}

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The witch drinks or throws a potion and casts a spell.

action.name: Broomstick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) bludgeoning damage. If the witch loses its broomstick, it loses its flying speed.

action.name: Drink Potion
entries: The witch drinks one of its potions, allowing it to immediately cast the infused spell.

action.name: Throw Potion
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/90 ft., one creature. {@h}The spell infused in the potion is cast, affecting only the target of this attack, and the potion shatters. On a miss, the potion shatters harmlessly.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dearest Gran's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). She can cast the following spells innately.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When Dearest Gran fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dearest Gran has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Wish Granter
entries: As long as she casts no other spells on the same day, Dearest Gran can cast {@spell wish} once per day using her innate spellcasting. She can't lose this spell.

action.name: Broomstick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) bludgeoning damage. If Dearest Gran is disarmed of her broomstick, she loses her flying speed.

legendary.name: Fey Casting
entries: Dearest Gran casts a spell with a casting time of one action.

trait.name: Bandolier
entries: The freelancer carries 10 pieces of ammunition for its hunting rifle and 3 of each type of grenade it can use. It can replenish its hunting rifle ammunition after completing a short rest using its smith's tools.

trait.name: Shield of Missile Attraction
entries: Whenever a ranged weapon attack is made against a target within 10 feet of the freelancer, the freelancer becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Tinker's Shield
entries: The freelancer's shield is held by a mechanical frame and arm attached to its back. The freelancer does not require a free hand to benefit from its shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The freelancer makes two ranged weapon attacks and can use one of its grenades.

action.name: Hunting Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/240 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage. The freelancer must spend an action to reload this weapon after making 5 attacks.

action.name: Fragmentation Grenade
entries: The freelancer throws the grenade at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 20 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Smoke Grenade
entries: The freelancer throws the grenade at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. The grenade emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily-obscured area in a 20-foot radius. A moderate wind (10 mph) disperses the smoke in 4 rounds, and a strong wind (20 mph) disperses it in 1 round.

trait.name: Bandolier
entries: The tech master carries 3 energy cells for its antimatter rifle (one energy cell fully reloads the rifle) and 3 of each type of grenade it can use.

trait.name: Cloak of Protection
entries: The tech master's AC and saving throws are increased by 1 while it is wearing its cloak of protection.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tech master makes one ranged weapon attack and can use one of its grenades.

action.name: Antimatter Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d8 + 3}) necrotic damage. The tech master must spend an action to reload this weapon after making 2 attacks.

action.name: Black Hole Grenade
entries: The tech master throws the grenade at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 40 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage if it's within 40 feet of the grenade, or 22 ({@damage 5d8}) radiant damage if it's within 20 feet of the grenade. Then, the creature is pulled up to 20 feet towards the grenade. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

action.name: Geneva Grenade
entries: The tech master throws the grenade at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. The grenade emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily-obscured area in a 40-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn within the smoke must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. Once out of the area of effect, a creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition poisoned} condition on a success.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: When the iron avenger is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The iron avenger makes two attacks with its blasters, then uses its seeker missiles.

action.name: Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 100/300 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d8 + 3}) radiant damage.

action.name: Seeker Missiles
entries: The iron avenger targets three creatures it can see within range of its blindsight. Each target takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage. This damage can be blocked with the {@spell shield} spell.

legendary.name: Blaster
entries: The iron avenger makes an attack with its blasters.

legendary.name: Field Repairs
entries: The iron avenger regains 10 hit points.

legendary.name: Laser Spin (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the iron avenger must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

legendary.name: Threat Seeker
entries: The iron avenger extends its {@sense blindsight} to 120 feet until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Inactive
entries: The Ravageslicer can't take actions or reactions until it is fed the spell focuses of six 5th-level spellcasters or higher.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Ravageslicer makes two attacks with its buzzsaws. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Buzzsaw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}32 ({@damage 5d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The Ravageslicer belches fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 18d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alchemist's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence ({@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks, spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The alchemist can cast the following spells innately.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alchemist is a 4th-level spellcaster. The alchemist's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The alchemist knows the following artificer spells.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The alchemist makes two attacks with its compound hand crossbow. It can replace one of these attacks with its Potion Vial action.

action.name: Compound Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. This crossbow does not have the loading property of crossbows and does not need to be reloaded between attacks. This is a +1 magic weapon.

action.name: Potion Vial
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/40 ft., one target. {@h}The target and all other creatures within 5 feet of the target take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of a type of the alchemist's choosing. The type can be acid, cold, fire, poison, or lightning.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mad scientist is a 5th-level spellcaster. The mad scientist's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The mad scientist knows the following artificer spells.

trait.name: Bandolier
entries: The mad scientist carries 3 grenades.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mad scientist throws two potion vials.

action.name: Geneva Grenade
entries: The mad scientist throws the grenade at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. The grenade emits a cloud of smoke that creates a heavily-obscured area in a 40-foot radius. A creature that starts its turn within the smoke must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. Once out of the area of effect, a creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition poisoned} condition on a success.

action.name: Potion Vial
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 15/40 ft., one target. {@h}The target and all other creatures within 5 feet of the target take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of a type of the mad scientist's choosing. The type can be acid, cold, fire, poison, or lightning.

action.name: Seeker Missiles
entries: The mad scientist targets three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage. This damage can be blocked with the {@spell shield} spell.

spellcasting.name: Initiate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The armorer is a magic initiate. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following wizard spells.

trait.name: Defensive Field (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the armorer gains 10 temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armorer makes two attacks with its thunder gauntlets.

action.name: Thunder Gauntlets
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) thunder damage, and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than the armorer until the start of the armorer's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Initiate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The armorer is a magic initiate. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following wizard spells.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armorer makes two attacks with its lightning launcher.

action.name: Lightning Launcher
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 90/300 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage, and the next attack roll against the target from a creature other than the armorer before the end of the armorer's next turn is made with advantage.

monster.name: Arcane Turret
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Arcane Repairs
entries: If mending is cast on the turret, it regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

action.name: Flamethrower
entries: The turret exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

action.name: Force Arrow
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, it is pushed up to 5 feet away.

action.name: Detonation
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the turret must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. The turret is destroyed.

skill.special: {@item smith's tools|phb} {@d20 6}, {@item tinker's tools|phb} {@d20 8}, {@item woodcarver's tools|phb} {@d20 6}

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The alchemist is a 4th-level spellcaster. The artillerist's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The artillerist knows the following artificer spells.

trait.name: Arcane Turret
entries: As a bonus action, the artillerist can summon an {@creature arcane turret|OCLD}, which appears within 5 feet of it and acts on the artillerist's initiative. The turret lasts until it is dismissed by the artillerist as a bonus action or until 10 minutes have passed. The artillerist can have up to 3 turrets summoned at once.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artillerist makes two attacks with its compound hand crossbow.

action.name: Compound Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack:

{@hit 6} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. This crossbow does not have the loading property of crossbows and does not need to be reloaded between attacks. This is a +1 magic weapon.

skill.special: {@item smith's tools|phb} {@d20 6}, {@item tinker's tools|phb} {@d20 8}, {@item woodcarver's tools|phb} {@d20 6}

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The trebucheter is a 4th-level spellcaster. The trebucheter's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). The trebucheter knows the following artificer spells.

trait.name: Arcane Turret (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the trebucheter can summon an {@creature arcane turret|OCLD}, which appears within 5 feet of it and acts on the trebucheter's initiative. The turret lasts until it is dismissed by the trebucheter as a bonus action or until 10 minutes have passed. The trebucheter can have up to 3 turrets summoned at once.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The trebucheter launches two sticks of dynamite, then uses its trebuchet, if available.

action.name: Dynamite Mortar
entries: The trebucheter launches a stick of dynamite at a point it can see within 1,500 feet of it. The dynamite lands and explodes at the start of the trebucheter's next turn. A creature can ascertain the precise location the dynamite will land with a {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check. Each creature within 5 feet of the dynamite when it explodes must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Launch Trebuchet {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 300/900 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) bludgeoning damage. This attack deals double damage to objects and structures.

variant.name: The Trebuchet
entries: The trebucheter, a more powerful artillerist, makes use of a trebuchet and an arcane turret in combat. With a trebuchet, an artificer can use a counterweight to launch a 650 pound stone projectile over 300 feet.
The Trebuchet is a Huge construct with 40 HP and AC 13.

monster.name: Mechanical Servant
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The servant makes two attacks.

action.name: Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Superior Attunement
entries: The attuner can attune to four magic items maximum, instead of three.

action.name: Thunder Cannon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/500 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Blast Wave {@recharge 5}
entries: The attuner releases energy from its cannon in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the cone must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) thunder damage and be pushed 10 feet away from the attuner.

reaction.name: Aid Me, Servant!
entries: When a creature targets the attuner with a melee attack and the attuner's {@creature mechanical servant|OCLD} is within 5 feet of the creature, the attuner can command its {@creature mechanical servant|OCLD} to make a melee weapon attack against that creature. The mechanical servant's attack hits before the target creature's attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The battle smith is a 4th-level spellcaster. The battle smith's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The battle smith knows the following artificer spells.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The battlesmith makes two melee weapon attacks.

action.name: Arcane Firehammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. This is a +1 magic weapon.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Beyond Death
entries: When the blood hunter is reduced to 0 hit points, it falls {@condition unconscious} and its spirit rises from its body. Its spirit is a ghost that replaces its actions with only the Rite Scythe attack. If the blood hunter dies, its spirit also dies, and vice versa. If the spirit reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the blood hunter regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points. The blood hunter's spirit immediately returns to its body if the blood hunter wakes up by any means.

trait.name: Hunter's Bane
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track fey, fiends, and undead, and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blood hunter makes three attacks with its rite weapon.

action.name: Rite Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) radiant damage. If the damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the blood hunter regains 9 ({@dice 2d8}) hit points. This is a magic weapon.

reaction.name: Blood Curse of the Fallen Puppet
entries: When an ally of the blood hunter is reduced to 0 hit points while within 30 feet of it, the blood hunter can give the creature a final act of aggression. Before it falls {@condition unconscious} or dies, the ally can make one weapon attack against a target of the blood hunter's choice within weapon range.

trait.name: Hunter's Bane
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track fey, fiends, and undead, and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Lycan Resistance
entries: The blood hunter's damage resistances function only while in its hybrid form.

trait.name: Feral Desperation
entries: While in hybrid form, the blood hunter has advantage on ability checks and saving throws using Strength, and it has a +2 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls (included in the attack).

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The blood hunter can use its bonus action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blood hunter makes two Rite Strikes.

action.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage or 9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage if wielded with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Rite Strike (Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

trait.name: Blood Curse of the Transfusion
entries: As a bonus action, the blood hunter can heal an allied creature within 30 feet of it by 14 ({@dice 4d6}) hit points. The blood hunter takes damage equal to the hit points regained.

trait.name: Hunter's Bane
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track fey, fiends, and undead, and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

trait.name: Reconstruction
entries: If the blood hunter starts its turn with at least 1 hit point, it regains 10 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blood hunter makes two attacks with its rite weapon.

action.name: Rite Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. This is a magic weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blood hunter is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells, and can cast them using its rite weapon as its spellcasting focus.

trait.name: Hunter's Bane
entries: The blood hunter has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track fey, fiends, and undead, and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The blood hunter can either make two attacks with its rite weapon or cast a cantrip and make one weapon attack.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Rite Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage. If the damage from this attack reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the blood hunter regains an expended spell slot. This is a magic weapon.

action.name: Diabolic Channel
entries: The blood hunter makes one attack with its rite longbow against a creature. If the attack hits, the blood hunter can cast one spell on the target, regardless of the regular rules for range, affecting only that target. If the spell requires an attack roll, it automatically hits. If the spell requires a saving throw, the creature has disadvantage on the first saving throw made against the spell.

trait.name: Crossbow Specialist
entries: The bounty hunter ignores the loading property of crossbows, and it has a +2 to attack rolls made with its heavy crossbow (included in the attack).

trait.name: Follow Prey
entries: The bounty hunter has advantage on checks to track a target, and its passive Perception is increased by 5.

trait.name: Tracker's Mark
entries: As a bonus action, the bounty hunter chooses one target within 60 feet of its position that it can see, or replaces its mark with a new target it can see within range. The bounty hunter's weapon attacks ignore any damage resistances of the marked target and deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

trait.name: Tripwire Specialist
entries: The bounty hunter incurs no disadvantage on ranged attacks made against targets that are {@condition prone}, and when it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a ranged weapon attack, it can choose to knock the creature {@condition unconscious} and stabilise them rather than kill them.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bounty hunter makes two attacks with its heavy crossbow.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Restrain
entries: The bounty hunter attempts to restrain a {@condition prone} creature within 5 feet of its position. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity or Strength saving throw (its choice) or become {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} by the bounty hunter (escape {@dc 14}).

reaction.name: Distance Keeper
entries: When a hostile creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the bounty hunter, the bounty hunter can move up to 15 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Follow Prey
entries: The beast tamer and its animal companion have advantage on checks to track a target, and its passive Perception is increased by 5.

trait.name: Thrown Weapon Specialist
entries: The beast tamer can use its Dexterity instead of Strength to make ranged attacks with its handaxes. If it does so, it gains a +2 to its attack roll (included in the attack). The beast tamer has 12 handaxes available.

trait.name: Tracker's Mark
entries: As a bonus action, the beast tamer chooses one target within 60 feet of its position that it can see, or replaces its mark with a new target it can see within range. The weapon attacks of the beast tamer and its animal companion ignore any damage resistances of the marked target and deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to the marked target. The mark lasts until the beast tamer completes a long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The beast tamer makes three attacks with its handaxes.

action.name: Handaxe (Melee)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage. After making this attack, the beast tamer and its beast can both move up to 5 feet without expending movement.

action.name: Handaxe (Thrown)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage. After making this attack, the beast tamer and its beast can both move up to 5 feet without expending movement.

reaction.name: Distance Keeper
entries: When a hostile creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the beast tamer, the beast tamer can move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The primal warden's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells innately.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The primal warden is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following spells prepared.

trait.name: Follow Prey
entries: The primal warden has advantage on checks to track a target, and its passive Perception is increased by 5.

trait.name: Longbow Specialist
entries: The primal warden ignores half cover and three quarters cover when it makes attacks with its longbow, and it has a +2 to ranged weapon attack rolls (included in the attack).

trait.name: Tracker's Mark
entries: As a bonus action, the primal warden chooses one target within 60 feet of its position that it can see, or replaces its mark with a new target it can see within range. The primal warden's weapon attacks ignore any damage resistances of the marked target and deal an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The primal warden makes two attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The mystic's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Borrow Expertise (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the mystic chooses one creature with whom it is communicating telepathically. The mystic gains one skill, tool, or weapon proficiency of that creature (mystic's choice), lasting until it finishes a short or long rest. The mystic can choose to use the target's bonus to ability checks, attack rolls, and damage rolls with the chosen proficiency, rather than its own.

action.name: Mind Thrust
entries: The mystic blasts psychic energy at a creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) psychic damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the mystic.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The mystic's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Psionic Resilience
entries: If the mystic starts its turn with at least 1 hit point, it gains 5 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Psychic Weapons
entries: The mystic's weapon attacks are magical. Its weapons have a +1 to attack and damage rolls and deal an additional 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage on a hit (included in the attack). Its weapons are visible only to the mystic and the target of the attack.

trait.name: Surge of Speed {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the mystic can take both the {@action Dash} and {@action Disengage} actions.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The clown is an 8th level spellcaster. The clown's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following rouge spells prepared.

trait.name: Fearful Magic
entries: When a creature fails a saving throw against one of the clown's spells of 1st level or higher, it is also {@condition frightened} of the clown for the duration of the spell.

trait.name: Light-Footed
entries: The clown has resistance to damage taken as a result of a fall.

trait.name: Tumbler
entries: As a bonus action, the clown can take the {@action Disengage} action.

action.name: Clown's Club
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}The target takes 5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Penny Circus
entries: When a creature hits the clown with a melee attack, the clown can force it to make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} of the clown until the end of the clown's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The effects master is an 8th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following rouge spells.

trait.name: Fearful Magic
entries: When a creature fails a saving throw against one of the effects master's spells of 1st level or higher, it is also {@condition frightened} of the effects master for the duration of the spell.

trait.name: Illusory Visage
entries: Creatures do not form memories of the effects master's face unless they are immune to being {@condition charmed}. A creature can remember the effects master in other ways, such as its clothes, its build, its actions, its equipment, or its voice, but its face appears as a blurry smear in their memory. The effects master can choose specific creatures to ignore this effect.

trait.name: Special Effect
entries: The effects master's face is a shifting miasma of shapes and colours. As an action, it can reshape its make-up to form a scene from its memory or imagination, creating a rough visual approximation within the limitations of its make-up.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The fashionista is an 8th level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following rouge spells.

trait.name: Charming Magic
entries: When a creature fails a saving throw against one of the fashionista's spells of 1st level or higher, it is also {@condition charmed} by the fashionista for the duration of the spell.

trait.name: Fashion Statement
entries: As a bonus action, the fashionista can activate or deactivate its glow. While its glow is active, it sheds bright light up to 10 feet and dim light for 10 feet beyond that. A creature in the bright light has disadvantage on melee attack rolls against the fashionista unless it can see the fashionista through senses other than sight (such as blindsight or tremorsense).

trait.name: Gliding Model
entries: The fashionista has advantage on saving throws and ability checks made to avoid being knocked {@condition prone}, and it can ignore the effects of difficult terrain.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
